EmailTemplate.subject: Be Our Guest at The Conference Board’s 2018 Employee Health Care Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
I see you have not registered yet for the The Conference Board's Employee Health Care Conference next March. That is great because I can help save you money by extending a complimentary pass for you to attend!
The dates are March 8-9 in New York or March 27-28 in San Diego. Your complimentary pass, valued at $2,895, also includes attendance to the pre-conference workshop: Modernizing Benefits Delivery & Administration to Stay Agile and Engaging, being held 1:30 – 5 pm on March 7th in New York and March 26th in San Diego.
For additional details and see the conference agenda: Please visit Employee Health Care San Diego or Employee Health Care New York.
If you'd like to take advantage of this complimentary pass, please 1. let me know what city you’d like to travel to 2. let me know if you’d also like to attend the pre-conference workshop 3. include your contact details referenced below. a. Name b. Title c. Company d. Mailing Address (HQ is fine) e. Phone f. Email
We will have you registered through The Conference Board and you will receive a confirmation directly from their customer service team in about a week.
Thank you,
Neal Lewis Regional Vice President Livongo m: 239.633.0482 e: nlewis@livongo.com a: 3960 Deep Passage Way, Naples, FL 34109 www.livongo.com
